title: How to share my computer on the network - Quora

response.answer_text: Depending on what OS you are using but for Window you have to turn on discovery mode first which can be located in Network setting then just right click on a drive you want to share and choose properties then click on the sharing tab and check the box that allow sharing. On the computer you want to access the drive just go to file explorer and look for Map Drive and click on that then follow the on screen instruction to access the shared drive
